passive.name: Way of the Wanderer
passive.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is increased. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

skins.name: High Noon Yasuo
skins.description: The mysterious and reluctant sheriff of a two-street town, Yasuo is in self-imposed exile after being accused of murder in the eastern territories. Even so, he has driven off entire bandit gangs as well as many of the desert's deadliest threats, saving hundreds of lives along the way.

skins.name: PROJECT: Yasuo
skins.description: Yasuo returned from advanced combat only to be accused of a crime he did not commit. Knowing that PROJECT's corporate leadership was somehow involved, Yasuo fights with the G/NETIC rebels, cutting away the lies of technology with his plasma coated blade.

skins.name: Blood Moon Yasuo
skins.description: Ceremonial executioner of the Blood Moon cult, Yasuo's blade is inhabited by an insidious, bloodthirsty demon whose hunger for death can never be satisfied. This suits Yasuo well, for he is possessed of an inner darkness even deeper than the creature whispering at his side.

skins.name: Nightbringer Yasuo

chromas.name: Nightbringer Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: Born from festering echoes at the dawn of creation, Yasuo is the hellish embodiment of chaos in the cosmos. Fated to clash against the Dawnbringer for all time, he awaits a day when his darkness will finally cleave away her light.

skins.name: Odyssey Yasuo

chromas.name: Odyssey Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: Yasuo never wanted to be a space pirate… until he was framed for his brother's murder, and had to flee his life of relative luxury. Now on the run from a dozen different military and paramilitary factions, he's putting together an eccentric crew to make a new life among the stars.

skins.name: Battle Boss Yasuo

chromas.name: Battle Boss Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.name: Battle Boss Yasuo

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 Arcade event.

chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 Arcade event.

skins.description: One-time protagonist of the 1979 cult classic “Hasagi,” Yasuo was infected with Veigar's malignant code after the Battle Boss takeover of Arcadia. He maintains his impossibly complex gameplay patterns and high-damage attacks, but now fights for the forces of evil.

skins.name: True Damage Yasuo

chromas.name: True Damage Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.name: True Damage Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: As enigmatic as he is skilled, Yasuo is the veteran producer all others turn to for inspiration. His beats transcend genre, painting whole universes with wild textures of sound. Notoriously selective about his collaborations, Yasuo sees True Damage as his platform to revolutionize how society experiences music.

skins.name: Prestige True Damage Yasuo
skins.description: After the global success of “GIANTS,” reclusive producer-extraordinaire Yasuo was inundated with requests. From record deals to clothing sponsorships, he turned down one after another, preferring to stay out of the limelight to focus on the simple joys of making beats. However, A Bathing Ape somehow managed to secure his attention. Now, donning golden threads to match his musical brilliance, Yasuo holds the world's ears at attention—with fans and critics alike waiting to hear his next revolutionary track.

skins.name: Spirit Blossom Yasuo

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

skins.description: Long ago, two brothers fought a bitter war across Ionia. Yasuo, the younger brother, was a warlord renowned for his roguish demeanor—until he was accused of crimes against the country and took up arms to defend himself. Both were fated to fall in their final duel… a lesson, perhaps, in pride and hubris.

skins.name: Sea Dog Yasuo

chromas.name: Sea Dog Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Empowered by the Buhru during his fight against Viego of Camavor, Yasuo made an unlikely champion for the children of Nagakabouros—his obsession with past events flew in the face of everything they believed in. Yet even the mangiest sea dog has his day, and Yasuo stood against the forces of darkness, emerging triumphant.

skins.name: Truth Dragon Yasuo
skins.description: Alone against an army, Yasuo chose to stand and fight. He blocked a narrow pass between two mountains, allowing innocents to escape the bloodshed. Wielding the truth of steel as a dance, he felled countless foes—but even he could not hold out forever. The Dragon of Truth, moved by his swordsmanship, came down from its peak to bless him...

skins.name: Dream Dragon Yasuo
skins.description: The song of steel grew silent, and Yasuo was the last living soul on the battlefield—though he imagined he could hear the thankful murmurs of the villagers he'd protected. Wounded and dying, Yasuo produced his flute to play a last haunting elegy. The Dragon of Dreams descended from its mountaintop, moved by Yasuo's song, and offered him its power...

skins.name: Inkshadow Yasuo

chromas.name: Inkshadow Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: Inkshadow Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Inkshadow event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Inkshadow event.

chromas.name: Inkshadow Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released to celebrate MSI 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released to celebrate MSI 2023.

skins.description: Displaced from his home alongside Master Yi, Yasuo now uses his Inkshadow tattoos to ride the wind between Rabadon City and the outskirts, protecting civilians seeking asylum with help from the mysterious Man of Masks. Though he gave up his freedom in exchange for power, he sees the price as penance for being unable to help those who needed it most.

skins.name: Prestige Inkshadow Yasuo
skins.description: Sporting an elevated take on traditional Ionian menswear coupled with a fearlessly bare set of stunning blackout tattoos, Yasuo's gala look celebrates elegant rebellion, sartorial subversion, and an uprising of unprecedented design.

skins.name: Foreseen Yasuo

chromas.name: Foreseen Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: Yasuo glimpsed many paths in his dreams. One saw him as an old man, alone, having strayed far from his course. He had given up ambition, family, even love, all to atone for sins he could no longer remember. This vision was not a warning, but a reminder, for Yasuo knew he could always return to his path. He only needed to find it... or let it find him.

skins.name: Battle Wolf Yasuo

chromas.name: Battle Wolf Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.name: Battle Wolf Yasuo

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Anima Squad event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Anima Squad event.

skins.description: The first captain of the Wolf Squad, Yasuo fought alongside Riven in the early days of the invasion. He disappeared only to reemerge years later a battle-hardened survivalist, still wearing his original suit. He's here to warn Anima Squad that the enemy has evolved—and if they want to survive, they'll need all hands (and paws) on deck.

skins.name: Genesis Nightbringer Yasuo
skins.description: Born from festering echoes at the dawn of creation, Yasuo is the hellish embodiment of chaos in the cosmos. Fated to clash against the Dawnbringer for all time, he awaits a day when his darkness will finally cleave away her light.

passive.name: Damnation
passive.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

skins.name: Deep Terror Thresh
skins.description: “If there really was a kingdom beneath the sea, it must have been destroyed long ago. How else do you explain the revenants that prey upon these shores? How else does that thing—Thresh—exist, trapping our souls in his accursed diving bell?”

skins.name: Worlds 2013 Thresh

chromas.name: Worlds 2013 Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive during a Worlds event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive during a Worlds event.

skins.description: Celebrating Worlds 2013 in North America.

skins.name: Blood Moon Thresh
skins.description: A demon summoned on the night of the Blood Moon, Thresh's insatiable urge to torture and kill is fueled by thousands of vengeful spirits drawn to his lantern. Entire villages are left slaughtered in his wake, their blood staining the land for decades.

skins.name: SSW Thresh
skins.description: Honoring Mata's winning performance as Thresh during the 2014 World Championship.

skins.name: Dark Star Thresh

chromas.name: Dark Star Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.

skins.description: A cosmic nightmare who worships the all-consuming Dark Star, Thresh vows to feed the whole of existence to his “god” until all matter, time, and thought are erased. His work will be complete when nothing remains, freeing him to finally leap into the singularity and become one with the end of the universe.

skins.name: High Noon Thresh

chromas.name: High Noon Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: An ancient devil who stalks the great expanses of the Old West, Thresh's cruel visage is burned into the minds of all living things who fear the day he will come to claim their souls. His arrival spells doom for any settlement, its residents flayed and left to rot in the sun.

skins.name: Pulsefire Thresh
skins.description: As head of the Remembrancers, Thresh usually remains behind the scenes pulling the chains of time rather than stepping into the stream himself. Yet recent events have caused him to leave his temporal citadel, bringing his pulsefire lantern to bear.

skins.name: Prestige Pulsefire Thresh
skins.description: As paradoxes multiply and more rogue agents rebel against the grasp of the chrono-enforcers, Thresh, as commander of the Rembrancers, takes matters into his own hands. He must not yield control of time to these interlopers… nor to the growing Praetorian threat.

skins.name: FPX Thresh

chromas.name: FPX Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Honoring Crisp's winning performance as Thresh during the 2019 World Championship.

skins.name: Spirit Blossom Thresh

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

skins.description: An ancient demon of obsession, Thresh delights in tormenting the spirits of those he deems as flawed, but blossoming with potential. He haunts the spiritual afterlife as a supreme collector of souls, tempting the dead away from their path to salvation until they are trapped for eternity within their own memories.

skins.name: Unbound Thresh
skins.description: With every soul the Ruination seized, Thresh's lantern burned brighter. He had planned for this moment, after all: the chance to scour far beyond the Shadow Isles, the Mist's reach so much greater than his own. Reaping all he had so meticulously sown, Thresh was at last unbound from the shackles of the isles. He had forgotten how good it feels to have skin...

skins.name: Steel Dragon Thresh

chromas.name: Steel Dragon Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.name: Steel Dragon Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.

skins.description: The Steel Dragon, happiest curled up in its cavernous archive amidst its treasures, needed someone with a talent for acquiring esoteric new treasures—and its eye fell on Thresh. Honored to assist, Thresh's limitless appetite for acquisition warped into obsession. Now he stops at nothing to acquire what he wants, justifying his cruelty in the name of his benefactor.

skins.name: Prestige Pulsefire Thresh (2022)
skins.description: As paradoxes multiply and more rogue agents rebel against the grasp of the chrono-enforcers, Thresh, as commander of the Rembrancers, takes matters into his own hands. He must not yield control of time to these interlopers… nor to the growing Praetorian threat.

skins.name: Lunar Emperor Thresh

chromas.name: Lunar Emperor Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: Lunar Emperor Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Lunar Revel event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Lunar Revel event.

skins.description: Some are destined to rule. Others hear only echoes of glory, knowing nothing of the sacrifices that must be made! You must put your empire before EVERYTHING... even the lives of your subjects. The Emperor Thresh still guides his people, their souls forever safe, though their bodies were washed away. Someday, he'll heal his broken empire. All he needs is a kind empress' helping hand.

skins.name: Winterblessed Thresh

chromas.name: Winterblessed Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: Winterblessed Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Winterblessed event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Winterblessed event.

skins.description: Thresh, Sylas, and Camille laughed as the Aurora surged within them, until the laughs turned to screams! The raw power of the Aurora was too much, killing the inventor and dancer and leaving only a corrupted Thresh behind. Believing himself to be the rightful new Polaris, he raised his weapon, ready to doom Senna... when suddenly, Lucian appeared!

skins.name: Janitor Thresh

chromas.name: Janitor Thresh

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: There aren't many places, let alone stock brokerage firms, that will hire an ethically questionable, skull-faced custodian named Thresh, but Mundo wouldn't be a trillionaire if he didn't know a good bet when he saw one. Who better to clean up dirty money than a demon janitor?

passive.name: Get Excited!
passive.description: Jinx receives massively increased Move Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.

skins.name: Crime City Jinx
skins.description: Known by state police as “La Principessa,” Jinx is an unhinged hitwoman with loose ties to the Graves crime family. Sent into rival businesses as a figurative time bomb, the slightest offense will trigger one of her jubilant rampages, with body counts as high as the ceiling.

skins.name: Firecracker Jinx

chromas.name: Firecracker Jinx

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Lunar Revel event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Lunar Revel event.

skins.description: Never one to turn down an imaginary challenge, Jinx has constructed a number of Lunar Revel weapons, including a seven foot long rocket shaped like an angry dragon. She'll tell you it's a fun firecracker for parties. It is not.

skins.name: Zombie Slayer Jinx
skins.description: When a mutagenic virus turned the world into an undead purgatory, no one was more excited than Jinx. No laws, no civilization, not even a thin veneer of polite society had survived—just a numberless horde of slime-vomiting bullet sponges and all the ammo she can forage. It's paradise.

skins.name: Star Guardian Jinx
skins.description: Much to the annoyance of her team, Jinx is an impulsive and sometimes cynical Star Guardian who loves a good, glittery explosion. However, when the fighting starts, Jinx will throw herself into the battle to protect others, especially her childhood friend Lux.

skins.name: Ambitious Elf Jinx
skins.description: A master toy maker and inventor, Jinx believes she could one day become the greatest Santa anyone has ever seen. Other elves worry her creations could be classified as weapons... but sometimes that's the price of true ambition.

skins.name: Odyssey Jinx

chromas.name: Odyssey Jinx

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: Adept at building and/or destroying (but mostly destroying) a variety of haphazard, highly unstable weaponry for the Morning Star crew, Jinx also serves as the ship's pilot. Her previous job as a mining explosives technician resulted in a lot of collateral damage, and a thoroughly justified dismissal.

skins.name: PROJECT: Jinx

chromas.name: PROJECT: Jinx

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.name: PROJECT: Jinx

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 PROJECT event.

chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 PROJECT event.

skins.description: Jinx volunteered for PROJECT conversion, never expecting that a critical power failure would scramble her memory core, leaving her a psychopath driven by the manic voices in her head. Seemingly obsessed with destruction for its own sake, she has begun to show signs of something far more sinister than mere memory fragmentation: the cold, calculating influence of Program.

skins.name: Heartseeker Jinx

chromas.name: Heartseeker Jinx

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Love is a battlefield, and Jinx comes prepared! Armed with her beloved companion Fishbones, she's ready to break hearts—and bones. But if she likes you enough, she's prepared to play nice. Maybe. Probably not.

skins.name: Arcane Enemy Jinx
skins.description: Celebrating the RiotX Arcane event.

skins.name: Battle Cat Jinx

chromas.name: Battle Cat Jinx

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: Battle Cat Jinx

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Anima Squad event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Anima Squad event.

skins.description: Jinx is a one-cat demolitions squad, her natural destructive impulses turned toward more productive ends: fighting off the Primordians. She's not really a soldier, doesn't seem to care about humanity's cause, and doesn't follow orders -- but there's no arguing with Jinx's results.

skins.name: Prestige Battle Cat Jinx
skins.description: Unleashed and brandishing an arsenal of squid-stomping explosives strong enough to knock over a Primordian warship, Jinx has the enemy right in her claws. With this Battle Cat on the prowl? The war is as good as over.

skins.name: Cafe Cuties Jinx

chromas.name: Cafe Cuties Jinx

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: Determined to prove that she's the best pastry chef around, Jinx uses her unique blend of chaos and technique to impress her patrons and blow away the competition! Although she specializes in savory treats, she'll occasionally indulge in a little sugary goodness from time to time. But… don't get in her way while she's in the middle of a sugar rush.

skins.name: Arcane Fractured Jinx
skins.description: Inventor, maniac, hero—Jinx left the twin cities reeling after killing Silco and blowing up the Piltover Council. Her future had gone up in flames, and as she faced the pieces of her fractured life, Jinx did the same. Now a symbol of change, she must decide who she will become in a world shaped by her own chaos.

skins.name: T1 Jinx

chromas.name: T1 Jinx

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during T1 World Championship showcase.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during T1 World Championship showcase.

skins.description: Honoring Gumayusi's winning performance as Jinx during the 2023 World Championship.

passive.name: Granite Shield
passive.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for a few seconds, this effect recharges.

skins.name: Shamrock Malphite
skins.description: Malphite is a twenty-ton rock man who used to be part of an even larger rock that was destroyed, leaving him orphaned on a distinctly un-rocklike plane of existence. The guy could use a little luck.

skins.name: Coral Reef Malphite
skins.description: “When I was young, I used to watch our ships sail back to port—but of late can't bring myself to look. For every vessel that docks, another runs aground of coral that was not there before. It's as though even the seabed has turned against us, slowly moving toward some unfathomable end.”

skins.name: Obsidian Malphite
skins.description: As great mountains were ripped from their foundations during the rise of the Ashen Lord, from deep beneath them climbed strange, obsidian creatures, freed for the first time after thousands of years. They seem intent on stopping the Infernals, and are uniquely suited to defeating them.

skins.name: Glacial Malphite
skins.description: That's no glacier…

skins.name: Mecha Malphite
skins.description: Designated M-2, the “Mecha Malphite” unit is a massive, bipedal fortress capable of turning into a planetary drill—making it the ultimate defensive option when faced with new and powerful kaiju. A single punch from its gauntlets can blow holes through thick titanium sheeting, and such attacks have felled countless monsters.

skins.name: Ironside Malphite
skins.description: There are two kinds of mercenaries in the game today: the first being your rank-and-file sellsword, barely worth the stink of grog on his breath. The second is a nigh-indestructible golem, twenty feet tall, and made from the hull of a legendary gunship. Choose wisely.

skins.name: Odyssey Malphite

chromas.name: Odyssey Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: Malphite was once the pit boss of a deep space mining operation, until Jinx cracked the asteroid in half and got them both fired. His enduring loyalty to someone who is very obviously a psychopath has landed him in all kinds of danger across the galaxy, but he honestly doesn't seem to mind.

skins.name: Dark Star Malphite
skins.description: The remnants of a once lush and enormous exo-planet, the Dark Star consumed and reformed the broken cluster of planetary debris into a twisted consciousness, ever pulling others into its orbit, and unleashing oblivion upon all who cross its path.

skins.name: Prestige Dark Star Malphite
skins.description: Gilded by the Dark Star's touch and empowered through its radiance, Malphite barrels across space, demolishing entire systems and consuming the broken remnants into his immense and twisted form.

skins.name: FPX Malphite

chromas.name: FPX Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Honoring Doinb's winning performance as Malphite during the 2019 World Championship.

skins.name: Old God Malphite

chromas.name: Old God Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.name: Old God Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Coven event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Coven event.

skins.description: Appearing to mortals as a Jet-Black Ibex, Malphite was an Old God of the mountain slain by the Eclipse order and cast down onto the rocks below. Death did not claim him, but the mountain did—and now he rises in its hulking earthen form, the land itself twisted with hatred and consumed by new and terrible hungers.

skins.name: Lunar Guardian Malphite

chromas.name: Lunar Guardian Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: Lunar Guardian Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Lunar Revel event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Lunar Revel event.

skins.description: Malphite was one of three guardians of the Yun Tal Empire, a demi-god of crag and magma, his brothers-in-arms a serpent of water and a spirit of nature. Their friendship ended in an instant, when one guardian's infinitesimal betrayal led to the death of another. Now, Malphite stands alone with unwavering loyalty, desperate to restore his nation's former glory, no matter the cost of lives.

skins.name: Pool Party Malphite

chromas.name: Pool Party Malphite

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

skins.description: He's coarse, he's rough, he's irritating, and he gets EVERYWHERE.

passive.name: Clockwork Windup
passive.description: Orianna's Attacks deal additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna Attacks the same target.

skins.name: Gothic Orianna
skins.description: Her father gave her the light of life—and yet, Orianna always preferred the dark.

skins.name: Sewn Chaos Orianna
skins.description: Even the bravest children shy away from Orianna—a raggedy, whispering doll as old as the house itself. Some toys just aren't meant to be played with.

skins.name: TPA Orianna
skins.description: Honoring Toyz's winning performance as Orianna during the 2012 World Championship.

skins.name: Winter Wonder Orianna
skins.description: A strange clockwork girl imbued with the magic of the Winterlands, Orianna once lived within a snowglobe created by a kindly old inventor. At the end of his life he freed her, and now she searches for greater purpose, serving in the court of the Poro King.

skins.name: Heartseeker Orianna
skins.description: A mechanical girl built to find and comfort broken hearts, Orianna still does not understand why people run from her when she's only trying to help them. Still, she goes about her duties diligently, performing beautiful clockwork dances for any who would give her a chance.

skins.name: Dark Star Orianna

chromas.name: Dark Star Orianna

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Galaxies event.

skins.description: Born out of the remnants of a magnificently advanced system, Orianna serves the Dark Star with meticulous precision. She dances across galaxies in an endlessly horrifying performance, the only witness is the silent trail of destruction left in her wake.

skins.name: Victorious Orianna
skins.description: Victorious Orianna was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in Ranked Queues for Season 8. Her body has been reforged by Piltover's finest artificers, and enhanced with experimental hextech.

skins.name: Pool Party Orianna

chromas.name: Pool Party Orianna

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: With her latest outfit, Orianna is finally able to submerge completely in aquatic biomes. This brings her great joy, as a day at the beach previously required subsequent weeks of scrubbing salt, sand, and sometimes an angry crab out of her gears.

skins.name: Orbeeanna

chromas.name: Orbeeanna

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Careful not to get honey caught in those gears!

skins.name: Star Guardian Orianna

chromas.name: Star Guardian Orianna

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: When this robot girl wished upon the First Star, it granted her deepest desire: to become human. With that gift came all the responsibilities of a Star Guardian. Orianna analyzed the risks. Her chances of falling are… 1.3%. Of successfully blending in with high schoolers? The odds aren't looking great.

skins.name: T1 Orianna

chromas.name: T1 Orianna

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during T1 World Championship showcase.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during T1 World Championship showcase.

skins.description: Honoring Faker's winning performance as Orianna during the 2023 World Championship.

passive.name: Rising Spell Force
passive.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

skins.name: Nottingham Ezreal
skins.description: An adventuring elf from the outlying forest kingdoms, Ezreal likes to present himself as a “handsome rogue-paladin” named Jarro Lightfeather. Very few people believe his claims of knighthood, but they serve as a decent enough distraction between his disastrous misadventures.

skins.name: Striker Ezreal
skins.description: A young and flashy prodigy, Ezreal is Order United's most popular player. Or at least he was, until a long series of teleportation-related fouls got him in trouble with the oversight committee.

skins.name: Frosted Ezreal
skins.description: Ezreal occasionally finds himself in the Freljord, searching for such-and-such ancient artifact. But braving sub-zero temperatures, terrifying ice beasts, and angry Freljordian tribes is a tall order, even for him—that's why he goes in disguise. He's practically a different person!

skins.name: Explorer Ezreal
skins.description: Ezreal's almost suicidal obsession with braving tombs, ruins, forbidden temples, and abandoned cities has netted him a tidy handful of priceless relics. Most of those relics are sold off to pay exploration-related medical bills, but one of these days…

skins.name: Pulsefire Ezreal
skins.featuresText:
• All new spell effects and animations
  • Four stage evolving model
  • Pulsefire Ezreal and AI voices
  • Custom effects on a killing blow
  • Summoner icon
  • Summoner profile banner
skins.description: Temporal fugitive and time-hopping explorer extraordinaire, Ezreal leaps across disparate realities searching for interesting technology to acquire. He is responsible for countless paradoxes and is currently wanted by the dystopian Remembrancers, who hunt him relentlessly.

skins.name: TPA Ezreal
skins.description: Honoring BeBe's winning performance as Ezreal during the 2012 World Championship.

skins.name: Debonair Ezreal
skins.description: Tailored suits, fitted vests, and an elegant gauntlet let everyone know the difference between Ezreal and the common rabble is simple. He makes this look good, and they… don't.

skins.name: Ace of Spades Ezreal
skins.description:
First is the Ace, at a hurtling pace,
A man of both talent and vim,
Who holds all the cards in the court of High Stakes
Because everything's about him.

skins.name: Arcade Ezreal
skins.description: A skilled gamer transported to Arcade World by Veigar, Ezreal holds the world record for speedrunning the original version of Hyper Crystal Dungeon in 45 seconds, using a custom-made mobile controller. Veigar has made a terrible mistake.

skins.name: Star Guardian Ezreal
skins.description: With a boundless curiosity about the universe, Ezreal is a born explorer, and becoming a Star Guardian only served to fuel his appetite for discovery. Though known to wander off, he always returns when most needed, especially now, as a certain pink-haired Guardian from another team has caught his attention…

skins.name: SSG Ezreal
skins.description: Honoring Haru's winning performance as Ezreal during the 2017 World Championship.

skins.name: Pajama Guardian Ezreal
skins.description: The First Star has burdened Ezreal with a lot. The responsibility. The hefty weight of destiny. The sparkly outfit (he's used to it). “Attending a slumber party” was definitely not on the list of expected cosmic duties. Not that he minds, really… as long as they don't actually try to braid his hair.

skins.name: Battle Academia Ezreal
skins.description: A young orphan initially thought devoid of any superhuman abilities, Ezreal had resigned himself to a normal life once he graduated middle school. But an encounter with a deadly threat awakened his slumbering potential, and now he finds himself a 1st year at the prestigious Durandal God-Weapon Academy, where he's joined the ragtag Battle Club.

skins.name: PsyOps Ezreal
skins.description: A young hotshot and the newest recruit in the elite PsyOps unit, Ezreal's raw psychic ability is only matched by his severely over-inflated ego. He has successfully annoyed the rest of his team to the point they just direct him towards hard targets and half-hope he winds up dead.

skins.name: Prestige PsyOps Ezreal
skins.description: Ezreal's mastery of psychic military combat has driven him to new heights, attracting the attention of his handlers in High Command. He's calmed down a bit, earning some respect from his squad mates… but not enough. He's never calmed down enough.

skins.name: Porcelain Protector Ezreal

chromas.name: Porcelain Protector Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: Porcelain Protector Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Lunar Revel event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2022 Lunar Revel event.

skins.description: After accidentally unleashing an ancient evil sorceress while doing research in the university archive, Ezreal narrowly escaped certain death when Lux and the spirit of the Tiger Relic stepped in to save him. Though he is new to the world of magic, Ezreal has joined the Protectors— determined to help solve the problem he (inadvertently) caused.

skins.name: Faerie Court Ezreal

chromas.name: Faerie Court Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: Faerie Court Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Faerie Court event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Faerie Court event.

skins.description: Though he is a lord of the Summer Court, Ezreal would much rather be investigating ancient magical history than putting up with all the political drama. When his research reveals something curious about the Faerie queen's line of succession, however, Ezreal discovers that someone may have placed Karma upon the throne for their own purposes…

skins.name: HEARTSTEEL Ezreal

chromas.name: HEARTSTEEL Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.name: HEARTSTEEL Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2023 event.

skins.description: After a manufactured one-hit wonder launched Ezreal into the spotlight, only for him to fall out of it again when the album got panned, Ezreal decided it was time he took some creative control back. Now, having left his old label and lending what star power he has to HEARTSTEEL, Ezreal has found musicians and friends he's ready to make a comeback with.

skins.name: Heavenscale Ezreal

chromas.name: Heavenscale Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.name: Heavenscale Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Heavenscale event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Heavenscale event.

chromas.name: Heavenscale Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Heavenscale event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Heavenscale event.

skins.description: Wherever chaos is sown, dragons across the kingdom know to listen for Ezreal's mischievous laughter. His japes are harmless, but don't let that merry spirit fool you: he is a shrewd royal scout alongside Kai'Sa who has braved many adventures between bouts of pranking. Dressing up like a human to go party? Now that sounds like his idea of a good time.

skins.name: Prestige Heavenscale Ezreal
skins.description: Ezreal's gilded gala garb is fit for royalty. Adorned in hand-crafted scales and crystal horns, this tastemaker came to the party with a mission: ring in the New Year not just with a bang, but a roar.

skins.name: Masque of the Black Rose Ezreal

chromas.name: Masque of the Black Rose Ezreal

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

Masque of the Black Rose Ezreal

skins.description: Greetings, Jarro Lightfeather. We cordially invite you to the Silken Danse. Word of your heroism has reached the halls of Noxian nobility, and we are keen to meet you. We operate in the same manner, working beyond regional lines. You've much to learn about us, and we've much to learn about you, Lightfeather… Or, shall we be forthright, Ezreal? –Lady Elise
